author: Reuters Editorial
title: Taiwan Jan export orders jump 19.7 pct y/y, beat forecast
text: TAIPEI, March 1 (Reuters) - Taiwan's export orders for January, released by the Ministry of Economic Affairs on Thursday. The data is an indication of the strength of Asian exports and of global demand for technology. January REUTERS POLL December Export orders (y/y pct) +19.7% +16.1 +17.5 Export orders from China +31% +7.9 Export orders from U.S. +16.3% +10.2 Export orders from Europe +15.3% +39.3 Export orders from Japan +17.8% +19.9 The ministry's website is www.moea.gov.tw/ (Reporting by Emily Chan; Writing by Yimou Lee; Editing by Jacqueline Wong)
